about_the_game:
About This Demo

This demo is a smaller playable version of Grandpa’s Bee Haven which is an engaging idle-beekeeping simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen while you multitask. Your mission? Help Grandpa grow his beekeeping business into a real beekeeping haven. Work together with Grandpa’s helpers to produce unique bee resources and craft bee product,

Set Up Your Apiary

Strategically place beehives in ideal locations and populate them with different bee species. Ensure your bees thrive by adding nearby watering stations, honey extractors for harvesting, and solar wax melters for collecting beeswax. Once you’ve planned the layout, Grandpa and his helpers will get to work building and assembling everything. In this demo version some beekeeping equipment for example sugar syrup and rat traps are greyed out and can not be used and will be only available in the full release.

Produce and Upgrade

Unlock hive upgrades to generate valuable resources like honey, pollen, beeswax, propolis, and royal jelly. Use these resources to invest in further upgrades or craft unique products.

Hire Helpers

Expand the bee haven team with charming helpers! Recruit Grandma, Cat and Dog in this version of the game to keep grandpa company and help him. Shaman and Scientist are greyed out and can be hired only in the full game release. Helpers have different capabilities. For example Grandma boosts production alongside with Grandpa.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Grandpa’s Bee Haven demo! A charming 2D idle beekeeping simulator where you help Grandpa embark on his beekeeping journey by buying and placing different beehives, upgrading them, unlocking new hive types and bee species, hiring helpers, and finally decorating your beekeeping haven.
